metadata.description:
A truly epic post-apocalypse adventure, created by ANTONY JOHNSTON (DEAD
SPACE, DAREDEVIL, THE COLDEST CITY) and CHRISTOPHER MITTEN (CRIMINAL
MACABRE, BATMAN)! Set 100 years after a world-shattering event known only
as "The Big Wet", WASTELAND is the story of Michael, a wandering scavenger,
who finds a strange talking machine that will change his life forever...
with a promise of leading him to the truth about the Big Wet! A violent and
politically charged epic reflecting the worst fears of our own times.
metadata.name: Wasteland
